phrs.translation: 然而, 不过, 虽然, 尽管如此

sentences.sentence: Our defeat was expected but it is disappointing nevertheless.
sentences.translation: 我们的失败是意料中的事，尽管如此，还是令人失望。

sentences.sentence: There is little chance that we will succeed in changing the law. Nevertheless, it is important that we try.
sentences.translation: 我们几乎没有可能改变法律。不过，重要的是我们努力争取。

sentences.sentence: Although the market has been flat, residential property costs remain high. Nevertheless, the fall-off in demand has had an impact on resale values.
sentences.translation: 尽管市场一直疲软，房价持续偏高。然而需求的减少还是对二手房价格产生了影响。
